meanings.definition: The action of increasing or improving something.
meanings.sent1: Her enhancement of the garden made it more beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The software update provided an enhancement to the user experience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt at self-enhancement by wearing a bowtie was amusing.
meanings.sent4: His smile was an enhancement to the room, brightening everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The addition of colorful pillows was an enhancement that made the room feel cozy.

meanings.definition: A thing that increases or improves something.
meanings.sent1: The new paint color was an enhancement to the house's appearance.
meanings.sent2: Using fertilizer is a common enhancement for plant growth.
meanings.sent3: The oversized hat was an odd enhancement to his outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was an enhancement to the party, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The extra training sessions were an enhancement to his skills on the field.
